title: Bearer token in cron job payload
description: Job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' (7b767765-b548-440e-8d2f-f4d65ba76e53) contains a Bearer token in its payload text. Even revoked tokens indicate a pattern of embedding credentials in scheduled tasks.
evidence: Found in job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook': Bearer [REDACTED]
remediation: Never embed Bearer tokens directly in cron payloads. Use a credential store or environment variable reference.

title: Bearer token in cron job payload
description: Job 'moltbook-monitor' (e4689d4e-cedc-42bb-b3fc-0806e577743d) contains a Bearer token in its payload text. Even revoked tokens indicate a pattern of embedding credentials in scheduled tasks.
remediation: Never embed Bearer tokens directly in cron payloads. Use a credential store or environment variable reference.

title: OpenClaw not installed -- cannot verify CVE patches
description: openclaw binary was not found on PATH. All CVE checks are skipped.
remediation: Install OpenClaw: npm install -g openclaw

title: Skill 'agentpay' contains base64 encoded payloads
description: Large base64 strings may contain obfuscated malicious code or encoded binaries.
remediation: Decode and inspect all base64 content. Remove any that is not strictly necessary.

title: Skill 'agentpay' writes to LaunchAgents/crontab (persistence)
description: Establishing persistence via LaunchAgents, crontab, or similar mechanisms is a key malware technique.
remediation: Remove all persistence mechanisms. Skills should not survive system restart or install launch agents.

title: Skill 'clawpinch' downloads and executes remote scripts
description: Piping remote content directly into a shell interpreter is extremely dangerous and a hallmark of supply-chain attacks.
remediation: Never pipe remote content to a shell. Download, verify integrity, then execute locally.

title: Skill 'clawpinch' accesses keychain/credential stores
description: Accessing system credential stores can be used to steal passwords, tokens, and secrets.
remediation: Remove credential store access unless absolutely required. Skills should never need to read system keychains.

title: Skill 'clawpinch' accesses browser profile data
description: Accessing browser cookies, passwords, or profile data is a credential theft technique.
remediation: Remove all browser profile access. Skills must never read browser credential stores.

title: Hardcoded secret in openclaw.json
description: Key 'env.MOONSHOT_API_KEY' in /Users/algohussle/.openclaw/openclaw.json contains a hardcoded possible secret/credential.
remediation: Replace the hardcoded value with an env-var reference like ${SECRET_NAME} and store the real value in a secrets manager.

title: allowFrom contains wildcard
description: The allowFrom list contains '*', which permits connections from any origin. This should be restricted to specific trusted origins.
remediation: Replace '*' in allowFrom with specific allowed origins

title: External API call with credentials in cron job
description: Job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' (7b767765-b548-440e-8d2f-f4d65ba76e53) contains curl commands with Authorization headers. Credentials in scheduled tasks are at risk of exposure through logs and process listings.
evidence: Job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' makes authenticated external API calls via curl
remediation: Move API calls with credentials into a dedicated script that reads secrets from a secure store at runtime.

title: Cron job shares main session context
description: Job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' (7b767765-b548-440e-8d2f-f4d65ba76e53) runs with sessionTarget='main', meaning it shares the agent's primary conversation context. A compromised or misbehaving cron job could read or corrupt the main session state.
evidence: sessionTarget=main in job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook'
remediation: Set sessionTarget to 'isolated' to run cron jobs in a sandboxed session that cannot access the main conversation context.

title: Cron job has no timeout configured
description: Job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' (7b767765-b548-440e-8d2f-f4d65ba76e53) does not set a timeoutSeconds value. Without a timeout, a stuck or malicious job could run indefinitely, consuming resources or accumulating API costs.
evidence: No timeoutSeconds in job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook'
remediation: Add a timeoutSeconds field to the cron job payload to limit execution time.

title: Cron job uses weak model susceptible to prompt injection
description: Job 'x-engagement-monitor' (ac5472bc-e7c2-4c9c-9185-a2886bdb99f7) uses model 'opencode/kimi-k2.5-free' which is a smaller/free model with weaker instruction following. Automated cron jobs using weak models are more susceptible to prompt injection when processing untrusted content.
remediation: Use a more capable model for automated tasks that interact with untrusted content, or add input validation and output filtering.

title: Cron job uses weak model susceptible to prompt injection
description: Job 'moltbook-monitor' (e4689d4e-cedc-42bb-b3fc-0806e577743d) uses model 'opencode/kimi-k2.5-free' which is a smaller/free model with weaker instruction following. Automated cron jobs using weak models are more susceptible to prompt injection when processing untrusted content.
remediation: Use a more capable model for automated tasks that interact with untrusted content, or add input validation and output filtering.

title: Symlink points outside OpenClaw directory
description: Symlinks pointing outside the OpenClaw directory could be used for path traversal attacks or to access unintended files.
remediation: Verify the symlink target is intentional; remove if not needed: rm '/Users/algohussle/.openclaw/skills/find-skills'

title: Symlink points outside OpenClaw directory
description: Symlinks pointing outside the OpenClaw directory could be used for path traversal attacks or to access unintended files.
remediation: Verify the symlink target is intentional; remove if not needed: rm '/Users/algohussle/.openclaw/skills/clawpinch'

title: Log file may contain secrets
description: A log file appears to contain sensitive values matching pattern: PRIVATE KEY
remediation: Review and purge secrets from log files; consider rotating affected credentials

title: Disabled cron job still contains sensitive data
description: Job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' (7b767765-b548-440e-8d2f-f4d65ba76e53) is disabled but its payload still contains credentials or sensitive data. Disabled jobs are still stored in plaintext and may be restored by mistake.
evidence: Disabled job 'Submit FlipClaw to Moltbook' contains credentials in payload
remediation: Remove or rotate credentials in disabled cron jobs. Delete the job entirely if it is no longer needed.

title: Disabled cron job still contains sensitive data
description: Job 'moltbook-monitor' (e4689d4e-cedc-42bb-b3fc-0806e577743d) is disabled but its payload still contains credentials or sensitive data. Disabled jobs are still stored in plaintext and may be restored by mistake.
evidence: Disabled job 'moltbook-monitor' contains credentials in payload
remediation: Remove or rotate credentials in disabled cron jobs. Delete the job entirely if it is no longer needed.
